name: @becrafter/prompt-manager
description: Remote MCP Server for managing prompts

scripts.desktop:dev: npm run admin:build && rm -rf ~/Library/Application\ Support/@becrafter/prompt-desktop/prompt-manager && npm run dev --prefix app/desktop
scripts.desktop:build: npm run admin:build && rm -rf ~/Library/Application\ Support/@becrafter/prompt-desktop/prompt-manager && npm run build --prefix app/desktop && echo 'Build completed! Time:'$(date +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
scripts.desktop:build:all: npm run admin:build && npm run build --prefix app/desktop -- --mac --win --linux
scripts.desktop:build:mac: npm run admin:build && npm run build --prefix app/desktop -- --mac
scripts.desktop:build:win: npm run admin:build && npm run build --prefix app/desktop -- --win
scripts.desktop:build:linux: npm run admin:build && npm run build --prefix app/desktop -- --linux
